description: The Two Pixis Brothers Farm is dedicated to raising and selling high-quality citrus fruit seedlings, including oranges, tangerines, and lemons, in Makueni County. The farm not only provides grafting and consultation services to local farmers but also focuses on training and empowering the community to improve agricultural practices. he farm aims to improve local food security by providing high-quality seedlings that are more productive and resilient to drought and diseases compared to traditional varieties.
name: Two Pixis Brothers Farm
